name: @cfpb/jumbo-mortgage
description: Check if a loan is jumbo or high balance.

scripts.browser: mkdir -p dist && browserify index.js -s jumbo -o dist/jumbo-mortgage.js && uglifyjs dist/jumbo-mortgage.js -m -c sequences,dead_code,conditionals,booleans,unused,if_return,join_vars,drop_console -o dist/jumbo-mortgage.min.js
